ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in auto electronic shutter function. The color camera's AES speed can reach 1/100,000s.
Night-time viewing, vandal-proof, widely applied to day & night, indoor & outdoor surveillance.
Adopt color Color 1/3 Double Scanning HD CCD sensor,High definition and stability, strong anti-jamming, rich and real color.
Night-time Vision: Adopt TaiWan high quality IR LED, having very good night vision effect.
Built-in auto gain control circuit. The color camera can get high definition picture in low Lux condition.
ProductInfo.Name: ePathChina® 700TVL Color 1/3 Double Scanning HD CCD Sensor Night Vision Vandal-proof HD Dome CCTV Surveillance Camera with OSD Menu, Night Vision Security Camera Infrared to 50 Feet, White Dome Day&Night IR LEDs CCTV Survillance Camera for Indoor/Outdoor/Home/Office/Small Business Security Video Surveillance
